TITLE.P: P6-2 Entreprise E2 Vannledning Langnes Åga

SHORT_DESCR.P: Water supply from Langneset to Anfiskåga, planned for 2018.
This Contract is for the establishment of water supply with a DN 355 PE pipeline.
In a ditch, including technical installations, as well as the establishment of areas for directional drilling and temporary accesses.
The Contract also includes the delivery and drawing of pipes in the drilling holes.
The total pipe length in the ditch and drilled trace is approx. 1850 m.
The longest drilling hole is approx. 950 m, a short drilling hole approx. 160 m and a total ditch length of approx. 750 m.

The Contract also includes renewal of the water supply Langnes east, from Terminalveien, Crossing the railway and E6, Sørlandsveien. This part of the Contract is described as an option. An alternative solution is requested, based on the tenderer´s method for Implementation.
Water supply from Langneset to Anfiskåga, planned for 2018.
This Contract is for the establishment of water supply with a DN 355 PE pipeline.
In a ditch, including technical installations, as well as the establishment of areas for.
The Contract also includes the delivery and drawing of pipes in the drilling holes.
The total pipe length in the ditch and drilled trace is approx. 1850 m.
The longest drilling hole is approx. 950 m, a short drilling hole approx. 160 m and a total ditch length of approx. 750 m.

The Contract also includes renewal of the water supply Langnes east, from Terminalveien, Crossing the railway and E6, Sørlandsveien. This part of the Contract is described as an option. An alternative solution is requested, based on the tenderer´s method for implementation.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: Chapter 4 in the calculation of amounts and description is described as an option.
The chapter includes approx. 70 m water pipeline under the E6 and railway.
Chapter 5 in the calculation of amounts and description is described as an alternative to chapter 4.

INFO_ADD.P: A site inspection will be held 10.1.2017, 10.00.
Meet at Norconsult´s offices, Halvar Heyerdals vei 4, 8601 Mo i Rana.
The project is subject to financing and that contracts and authorisations are approved.

REVIEW_PROCEDURE.P: Rana municipality will sent a written simultaneous notification of the chosen tenderer to all tenderers. The waiting period before the Contract is signed will be 10 days after notification has been given of the chosen tenderer.
Appeals to Rana municipality´s choice of tenderer shall be sent to:
Rana municipality, c/o Berit Kalstad, berit.kalstad@rana.kommune.no with a copy to tore.e.borstad@norconsult.com
